r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: 1) Fixed potential problem with empty datasets (yet another patch from Andrey Nigmatulin [anight at monamour dot ru]). 2) Fixed bug #2167 (thanks to [pbnadeau at gmail dot com] for noticing, testing and patching).
